room_title: Escape room "The Agency" by Escape the Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: Awesome, awesome, awesome! I highly recommend anyone who likes puzzles and brain games to go here.

room_title: Escape room "The Agency" by Escape the Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: Def doing this again!! So much fun and challenging!! Was so much more then I expected!! Great staff too! WE ESCAPED!!

room_title: Escape room "The Agency" by Escape the Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: I went with 3 of my friends! We had a blast! It's so much fun to do and the price is so worth it!! I definitely recommend checking it out

room_title: Escape room "The Agency" by Escape the Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: So much fun! We will definitely be coming back! It was worth the thirty bucks and was overall a great experience!

room_title: Escape room "The Agency" by Escape the Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: So far I have done the Agency and The Apartment and had a blast trying to get out of both!

room_title: Escape room "The Agency" by Escape the Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: So much fun. It helps to have a variety of ages because some of the young (20's) guys didn't know about some of the hints. The young guys helped us older folks with crawling around. Did the agency and we'll definitely go back for the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Agency" by Escape the Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: My friends and I did The Agency Room and LOVED it! We were a little skeptical before going in because we had never done anything like this before but it was awesome! The game itself was fun, fast paced, challenging but still manageable for us to solve and we had a great time working together. We are from North Carolina and I'm hoping there's something like this back there, but whenever we come back in to Pittsburgh to visit family we will definitely be back here!
